paragraphs.name: Daniel Cox About Me Paragraph 1
paragraphs.description: I graduated from NSCC IT Programming (Class of 2020). For the last 3 years I've been developing a 2.5D fantasy RPG platform game named Vex Monsters, where you save monsters from an evil mysterious villain.

paragraphs.name: Daniel Cox About Me Paragraph 2
paragraphs.description: Throughout my experience as a programmer, I have completed several challenging projects for game development (General), and web application backend. These projects taught me a hands-on mindset and approach. I learned how to analyze, study, and apply learning to figure out solutions when working alone or with a team.
